attributes.action: Introduce Blue Poppy Day to celebrate our NHS heroes
attributes.additional_details:
We rightly commemorate Remembrance Sunday with a red poppy.
It is time to introduce a Blue Poppy Day for our NHS heroes.
attributes.background:
Our NHS workers are all heroes.
They work on the front line fighting Covid 19 and regularly out their lives at risk to save others.
We believe that an annual Blue Poppy Day should be introduced to celebrate and commemorate our NHS heroes.
